DOC.brief_summary: This study ass short term effect single dose liothyronine cardiovascular system energy expenditure
DOC.criteria: BMI > 20 < 30 kg/m2 TSH > 0.5 < 5.0 mcIU/mL Negative TPO antibody Pregnancy Use prescription drug Diabetes mellitus Coronary artery disease Hypertension Anemia Renal insufficiency Liver disease ALT > 2.5 x upper laboratory reference limit
